name: The Finishing Hair Spray
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Spray
about: What it is: A modern-day hairspray that sets, defines, and adds polish for touchably soft and shiny hair. Provides flexible hold for everyday styling without alcohol or aerosols...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Type: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:- Frizz.- Hold & Style Extending.- Shine..Key Benefits: - Creates flexible hold to set styled hair in place with no crunch or stiffness.- Adds sleek, subtle shine without being sticky or drying out hair.- Weightlessly hydrates, strengthens, and reduces frizz..Highlighted Ingredients:- Tsubaki Meadows (Tsubaki Seed Oil & Meadowfoam Seed Oil): Weightlessly hydrates while protecting from heat, defines, and strengthens..- Acacia Senegal Gum: Provides flexible hold while keeping hair soft, shiny, and easy to re-style..- Panthenol: Conditions and softens hair...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: The Finishing Spray is formulated to set, style, add polish and nourish. Made with our proprietary Tsubaki Meadows oil blend for hydration, and our signature Brush Away Blend for buildable hold that can be easily brushed out without a wash, this innovative hairspray supports everyday styling...Fragrance Description: Crown Affairu2019s signature fragrance combines bergamot, yuzu, and lemongrass for a cool, light scent....Clean at Sephora
ingredients: -Tsubaki Meadows (Tsubaki Seed Oil & Meadowfoam Seed Oil): Weightlessly hydrates while protecting from heat, defines, and strengthens..-Acacia Senegal Gum: Provides flexible hold while keeping hair soft, shiny, and easy to re-style. .-Panthenol: Conditions and softens hair...Water/Aqua/Eau, Polyurethane-14, AMP-Acrylates Copolymer, Polyglyceryl-6 Ricinoleate, Polyglyceryl-6 Caprylate, Polyglyceryl-4 Caprate, Polyglyceryl-3 Cocoate, Glycerin, Camellia Japonica (Tsubaki) Seed Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Panthenol, Beta Vulgaris (Beet) Root Extract, Acacia Senegal Gum, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf, Rhizobian Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Polyitaconate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aminomethyl Propanol, Fragrance/Parfum, Undecylenoyl Glycine, Capryloyl Glycine, Phenoxyethanol, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Sodium Benzoate, Citral, Limonene, Potassium Sorbate, Linalool, Citric Acid...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Spray onto to dry, styled hair to set and finish strands for flexible hold..- Apply in a sweeping motion at least six to eight inches away from hair. As the formula is buildable, start with a small amount and add more until desired finish and hold is achieved..- Use on updos, when hair is down, to reduce flyaways or to add lightweight shine.
